battle_traits.name: The Blood Tithe
battle_traits.effect: You start the battle with 0 blood tithe points. Earn 1 blood tithe point each time a unit (friendly or enemy) is destroyed.

battle_traits.name: Brass Skull Meteor
battle_traits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Blood Tithe abilities this turn. Spend 4 blood tithe points and pick an enemy unit that is visible to a friendly Blades of Khorne Hero to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll 8 dice. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

battle_traits.name: Spelleater Curse
battle_traits.activation: Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability
battle_traits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Blood Tithe abilities this turn. Spend 2 blood tithe points.

battle_traits.name: Murderlust
battle_traits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Blood Tithe abilities this turn. Spend 1 blood tithe point and pick a friendly Blades of Khorne unit that is not in combat to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: The target can move 3". It can move into combat.

battle_traits.name: Slaughter Triumphant
battle_traits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Blood Tithe abilities this turn. Spend 8 blood tithe points.
battle_traits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Blades of Khorne units for the rest of the battle.
• Pick a friendly non-Unique Bloodthirster unit that has been destroyed. Set up an identical replacement unit on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

battle_traits.name: Heads Must Roll
battle_traits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any Blood Tithe abilities this turn. Spend 6 blood tithe points.
battle_traits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Blades of Khorne units.

Bloodbound Warhorde.name: Tireless Conquerors
Bloodbound Warhorde.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Bloodbound units that target an enemy unit that is contesting an objective you do not control.

Brass Stampede.name: Obliterating Charge
Brass Stampede.effect: If the unmodified charge roll for a friendly Blades of Khorne Cavalry unit is 8+, it has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

Khornate Legion.name: Butchers of Nations
Khornate Legion.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for a friendly Blades of Khorne Daemon unit
Khornate Legion.effect: Pick a friendly Bloodbound unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within 12" of the unit using this ability to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

Murder Host.name: Strength Through Slaughter
Murder Host.effect: If a friendly non-Monster Blades of Khorne Daemon uses a Fight ability, it has Ward (5+) for the rest of the turn.

heroic_traits.name: Favoured of Khorne
heroic_traits.effect: You begin the battle with 1 blood tithe point.

heroic_traits.name: Firebrand
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit is not a Priest, it has Priest (1). If this unit is already a Priest, add 1 to banishment rolls for it instead.

heroic_traits.name: Relentless Hunger
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit is picked to be the target of the ‘Murderlust’ ability, it can move 6" instead of 3".

artefacts_of_power.name: Halo of Blood
artefacts_of_power.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to this unit’s control score and to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit’s attacks.

artefacts_of_power.name: Collar of Contempt
artefacts_of_power.effect: This unit can use Unbind abilities as if it had Wizard (1). Each time this unit unbinds a spell, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster.

artefacts_of_power.name: Ar'gath, The King of Blades
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for the target for the rest of the turn.

Blood Blesssings of Khorne.name: Unholy Flames
Blood Blesssings of Khorne.declare: Pick a friendly Blades of Khorne Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly Blades of Khorne unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Blood Blesssings of Khorne.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

Blood Blesssings of Khorne.name: Blood Boil
Blood Blesssings of Khorne.declare: Pick a friendly Blades of Khorne Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Blood Blesssings of Khorne.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

Blood Blesssings of Khorne.name: Witchbane Curse
Blood Blesssings of Khorne.declare: Pick a friendly Blades of Khorne Priest to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy Wizard within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Blood Blesssings of Khorne.effect: Subtract 1 from the target’s power level, to a minimum of 0, until the end of your next turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, inflict 3 mortal damage on the target.

Judgements of Khorne.name: Summon Hexgorger Skulls
Judgements of Khorne.declare: If there is not a friendly Hexgorger Skulls invocation on the battlefield, pick a friendly Blades of Khorne Priest to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Judgements of Khorne.effect: Set up a Hexgorger Skulls invocation wholly within 12" of the chanter, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units. A Hexgorger Skulls invocation has 2 parts that must be set up within 8" of each other.

Judgements of Khorne.name: Summon Wrath-axe
Judgements of Khorne.declare: If there is not a friendly Wrathaxe on the battlefield, pick a friendly Blades of Khorne Priest to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Judgements of Khorne.effect: Set up a Wrath-axe wholly within 12" of the chanter, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Judgements of Khorne.name: Summon Bleeding Icon
Judgements of Khorne.declare: If there is not a friendly Bleeding Icon on the battlefield, pick a friendly Blades of Khorne Priest to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Judgements of Khorne.effect: Set up a Bleeding Icon wholly within 12" of the chanter and visible to them.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect:
When a number of damage points equal to this Manifestation’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this Manifestation is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

Each time this Manifestation moves, both its parts must end within 8" of each other.

Each part of this Manifestation is armed with a Stream of Molten Blood.

abilities.name: Hexgorgers
abilities.effect: For each part of this Manifestation that is within 8" of a Wizard (friendly or enemy), subtract 1 from casting rolls for that Wizard.

abilities.name: Blood Sacrifice
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Gain 1 blood tithe point.

abilities.name: Scorn of Sorcery
abilities.effect: This unit can use Unbind abilities as if it had Wizard (1).

abilities.name: Slaughterous Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a crushing charge roll of D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Herald of Trampling Death
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Bloodcrushers unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, weapons used by this unit and the target have Charge (+1 Damage).

melee.name: Mighty Axe of Khorne and Bloodflail

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Mighty Axe of Khorne and Bloodflail is 4.

abilities.name: Vengeance of Khorne
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 8 dice. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Commander Of Tyrants
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 other visible friendly non-Unique Bloodthirster units to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of each target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Horrific Predators
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Taker of Heads
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, Heal (3) this unit.

abilities.name: Blood For The Blood God!
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn if this unit charged in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Bloodsecrator

abilities.name: Icon of the Blood God
abilities.effect: If a friendly Bloodbound unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

abilities.name: Rage of Khorne
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristics of melee weapons used by friendly Bloodbound units for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Bloodbound Warmonger.

warscrolls.name: Bloodstoker

abilities.name: Whipped To Fury
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-Hero Bloodbound unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target can use Charge abilities even if it used a Run ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Bloodbound Warmonger.

warscrolls.name: Skullgrinder

abilities.name: Tempered By Fury
abilities.declare: Pick another friendly Bloodbound Hero within 8" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the target’s melee weapons. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that weapon for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Bone-crushing Strikes
abilities.effect: If this unit uses a Fight ability, all of the attacks target the same enemy Monster, and any of the attacks score a critical hit, that Monster has Strike‑last for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Bloodbound Warmonger.

abilities.name: Crimson Haze
abilities.effect: While this unit is in combat, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Bloodbound units, excluding Wrathmongers units, while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Bloodfury
abilities.effect: Each time an unmodified hit roll for a combat attack that targets this unit is 1, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Words of Hate
abilities.effect:
While this terrain feature has an Invoker:

• Add 1 to chanting rolls for the Invoker.
• The Invoker cannot use Move abilities.
• Instead of measuring range or visibility to the Invoker, measure to this terrain feature instead.
• All attacks that would target the Invoker target this terrain feature instead.
• If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Invoker. Then, set up the Invoker on the battlefield wholly within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer an Invoker. If it is not possible to set up the Invoker, it is slain.

abilities.name: Hatred of Sorcery
abilities.activation: Reaction: A friendly unit within 18" of this terrain feature was picked to be the target of an enemy spell
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 5+:
• If this terrain feature has an Invoker, gain 1 blood tithe point.
• Ignore the effect of that spell on that friendly unit.

This terrain feature can use this ability more than once per phase but you can only roll once for each friendly unit per spell cast.

abilities.name: Ascend The Altar
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have an Invoker, pick a friendly Blades of Khorne Infantry Priest within 3" of it and not in combat to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now an Invoker (see ‘Words of Hate’).

abilities.name: Descend The Altar
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has an Invoker that was not placed on it this turn, set up the Invoker on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer an Invoker.

abilities.name: Inescapable Wrath
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Roar of Total Rage
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll either 3 dice or a number of dice equal to the number of damage points this unit has. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Skarbrand's Rage
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, or if it did not use a Fight ability last turn, or if it is the first turn of the battle, the Attacks characteristic of its Slaughter is 6.

abilities.name: Brass Collar of Khorne
abilities.effect: This unit can use Unbind abilities as if it had Wizard (1).

abilities.name: Bestial Leap
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6" as if it had Fly but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Prey of the Blood God
abilities.effect: Pick an enemy Hero to be this unit’s quarry (see ‘Stalk the Prey’). You can pick a Hero in reserve.

abilities.name: Stalk The Prey
abilities.effect: If this unit’s quarry moved this phase, this unit can move up to 8". It cannot move into combat during any part of that move and must end that move closer to its quarry.

abilities.name: First of the Pack
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Flesh Hounds unit, add 2 to charge rolls for this unit. In addition, while any friendly Flesh Hounds units are wholly within 12" of this unit, they can ignore the effect of the ‘Beast’ ability.

abilities.name: Lord of the Bloodbound
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly Bloodbound Infantry units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: 'Bring Me Their Skull!'
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Gorechosen unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Thinning Veil
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, you can return D3 slain models to this unit.

abilities.name: The Slaughterborn
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability if it has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. On an 8+, set up a replacement unit on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Murderous Paragon
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Wrathmongers units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: No Respite
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll 2 dice. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Borne On Wings Of Blood
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve soaring above the battlefield. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: The Gaze of Khorne
abilities.effect: If a friendly Bloodbound unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6. However, friendly Bloodbound units cannot use Retreat abilities while they are within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: The Red Angel of Slaughter
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is soaring above the battlefield.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, pick a visible enemy unit within 10" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Blood for the Blood God!
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons if it charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Grisly Trophies
abilities.effect: If this unit is in a Blades of Khorne army and any enemy models were slain this turn by this unit’s attacks, you gain 1 blood tithe point.

abilities.name: Trial of Skulls
abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy unit this turn, add 8 to this unit’s control score. If this unit did not destroy an enemy unit this turn, it has a control score of 1 that cannot be modified.

warscrolls.name: Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne

abilities.name: Blood Call
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Blades of Khorne Daemon unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Sigil of Doom
abilities.activation: Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit within 8" of this Manifestation
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. On an 8+, that command has no effect, it still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use it are still lost.

abilities.name: No Respite
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll 2 dice. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Slaughterous Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a crushing charge roll of D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Dromm, Wounder of Worlds
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Dromm, Wounder of Worlds, is on the battlefield, it has Priest (1) and can use Unbind abilities as if it had Wizard (1).

warscrolls.name: Aspiring Deathbringer

abilities.name: Furious Warleader
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Blood Warriors unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by this unit and the target for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Bloodbound Warmonger.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Great Axe of Khorne is 3.

abilities.name: Shattering Charge
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target is Infantry, inflict an additional 3 mortal damage on it.

abilities.name: Outrageous Carnage
abilities.effect: Each time an attack made by this unit scores a critical hit, inflict D3 mortal damage on each enemy unit within 8" of it after the Fight ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Exalted Deathbringer

abilities.name: Glorious Ascent
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Deathbringer Weapon for each glorious ascent token it has.

abilities.name: First of the Gorechosen
abilities.effect: If any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by this unit’s combat attacks this turn and that enemy unit has been destroyed, Heal (5) this unit and give this unit a glorious ascent token.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Bloodbound Warmonger.

warscrolls.name: Skulltaker

abilities.name: Skulls For The Skull-Throne
abilities.effect: Each time an enemy Hero is slain by this unit, you receive 1 additional blood tithe point.

abilities.name: Heroe's Bane
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, while the target is in combat with this unit, this unit has Strike-first but all combat attacks it makes must target that enemy Hero.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Slaughter Seeker.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Mighty Axe of Khorne is 4 .

abilities.name: Beckon The Hunt
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-Unique Blades of Khorne Daemon unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Ensnaring Lash
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
If the target is in combat with this unit when the target is picked to use a Fight ability:

• It must pick this unit to be the target of the pile-in move (Core Rules, 15.3).
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made as part of that Fight ability against this unit.

abilities.name: The Scent of Blood
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Pack Hunters
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Flesh Hounds unit, this unit’s combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

abilities.name: Slaughterous Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a crushing charge roll of D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Hatred's Edge
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units that this Manifestation passed across this turn to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Unflagging Hunters
abilities.effect: Add 2 to charge rolls for this unit.

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: The Blood Must Flow
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Bloodletters unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, subtract 1 from ward rolls for damage points inflicted by each of those Fight abilities.

abilities.name: Grind Their Bones, Seize Their Skulls
abilities.effect: If any enemy models are slain by a Fight ability used by this unit, after that Fight ability has been resolved, this unit can immediately use a Shoot ability as if it were your shooting phase.

abilities.name: Gruesome Bombardment
abilities.effect: If any damage points are allocated to an enemy unit by a Shoot ability used by this unit, subtract 3 from that enemy unit’s control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Desecrating Blood Runes
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an objective or terrain feature within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Bloodbound units while they are wholly within 12" of the target.

abilities.name: Slaughterous Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a crushing charge roll of D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Lord of the Brass Stampede
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, the following effects apply to friendly Blades of Khorne Cavalry units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit:

• Add 1 to charge rolls for those units.
• You can re-roll crushing charge rolls for those units.
